page.title: 10Chickney, communications
page.content: No Post Office in the area. Stamped cards letters and small packages can be posted in letter boxes at Cutler's Green, Sibleys Which has 2 post boxes and Sharp's Farm. Post is delivered ti all dwellings every day except Sunday, and it is quite normal for postmen when they make deliveries, to collect outgoing mail from remote houses. Newspapers are also delivered every day. Cutler's Green has a public telephone box and there are private telephones at many houses and farms in this rural locality. Every household has one radio set at the least and most people have television as well. The sets can be hired if preferred and it costs less to have a set showing black and white pictures alone, primarily because of a much cheaper licence fee. RAEY03280663
